cuda.message: NVIDIA GPU detected but CUDA Toolkit not found
cuda.details: Install CUDA Toolkit from NVIDIA. Python packages will be installed automatically.

rocm.details: Install ROCm SDK from AMD. On Linux, typically installed to /opt/rocm.

vulkan.details: Vulkan SDK is installed. Works with NVIDIA, AMD, and Intel GPUs.

metal.details: Metal is only available on macOS with Apple Silicon.

openblas.details: OpenBLAS is optional. CPU backend will use default BLAS.

cpu.details: CPU backend works without any additional toolkits.
